Source: libs/User.js

'use strict';

var API = require('./API');
var config = require('../config');

/**
 * @namespace
 * @memberof SketchfabSDK
 */
function User(sdk) {
    this.sdk = sdk;
};

User.prototype = {

    /**
     * Get backgrounds for user
     * @memberof SketchfabSDK.User#
     * @param {string} id - User id
     * @return Promise
     */
    backgrounds: function(userId) {
        console.warn('User.backgrounds is not a public API. It might break in the future.');
        return API.get('/i/users/' + userId + '/backgrounds');
    },

    /**
     * Get environments for user
     * @memberof SketchfabSDK.User#
     * @param {string} id - User id
     * @return Promise
     */
    environments: function(userId) {
        console.warn('User.environments is not a public API. It might break in the future.');
        return API.get('/i/users/' + userId + '/environments');
    }

}

module.exports = User;
